title: Binance Extends BFUSD Promotion with Boosted APR Rewards
description: According to the announcement from Binance, the ongoing promotion for users holding BFUSD in their USDⓈ-M Futures and Portfolio Margin Accounts has been extended. Eligible users who meet the daily Open Interest requirement will continue to have the opportunity to earn boosted APR rewards on their BFUSD. The extended promotion period runs from 2025-11-18 00:00 (UTC) to 2025-12-01 23:59 (UTC). To qualify for the promotion, users must hold BFUSD in their Futures Account or Portfolio Margin Account and maintain a minimum daily Open Interest of 1,000 USD across their USDⓈ-M and COIN-M Futures positions
content: Binance Extends BFUSD Promotion with Boosted APR RewardsAccording to the announcement from Binance, the ongoing promotion for users holding BFUSD in their USDⓈ-M Futures and Portfolio Margin Accounts has been extended. Eligible users who meet the daily Open Interest requirement will continue to have the opportunity to earn boosted APR rewards on their BFUSD. The extended promotion period runs from 2025-11-18 00:00 (UTC) to 2025-12-01 23:59 (UTC). To qualify for the promotion, users must hold BFUSD in their Futures Account or Portfolio Margin Account and maintain a minimum daily Open Interest of 1,000 USD across their USDⓈ-M and COIN-M Futures positions

title: Metaplanet Reports Significant Growth in Third Quarter
description: According to BlockBeats, Japanese Bitcoin treasury company Metaplanet has released its financial results for the third quarter. The company reported sales of 24. 01 billion yen, marking a 94% increase from the previous quarter. Operating profit reached 13. 39 billion yen, up 64% from the last quarter. Net profit was recorded at 127 billion yen, while net assets grew by 165% to 532. 9 billion yen.
content: Metaplanet Reports Significant Growth in Third QuarterAccording to BlockBeats, Japanese Bitcoin treasury company Metaplanet has released its financial results for the third quarter. The company reported sales of 24. 01 billion yen, marking a 94% increase from the previous quarter. Operating profit reached 13. 39 billion yen, up 64% from the last quarter. Net profit was recorded at 127 billion yen, while net assets grew by 165% to 532. 9 billion yen.

title: Whale Trader Closes Position with Significant Profit
description: According to Odaily, Onchain Lens has reported that a major trader, who previously deposited $8 million in USDC to leverage a long position on Ethereum at 25x, has now fully closed their position. The trader realized a profit of $336,000 from this transaction.
content: Whale Trader Closes Position with Significant ProfitAccording to Odaily, Onchain Lens has reported that a major trader, who previously deposited $8 million in USDC to leverage a long position on Ethereum at 25x, has now fully closed their position. The trader realized a profit of $336,000 from this transaction.

title: Binance to Offer Up to 29% APR on Tezos Locked Products
description: According to the announcement from Binance, the platform is set to introduce a new promotion for Tezos (XTZ) on its Simple Earn Locked Products. This initiative allows users to earn up to 29% in annual percentage rate (APR) rewards by subscribing to XTZ during the specified promotion period. The promotion will run from 2025-11-13 10:00 (UTC) to 2026-02-11 23:59 (UTC), and existing XTZ locked positions will also be eligible for the enhanced rewards. The subscription process will operate on a first-come, first-served basis, with specific minimum and maximum subscription limits impacting the APR
content: Binance to Offer Up to 29% APR on Tezos Locked ProductsAccording to the announcement from Binance, the platform is set to introduce a new promotion for Tezos (XTZ) on its Simple Earn Locked Products. This initiative allows users to earn up to 29% in annual percentage rate (APR) rewards by subscribing to XTZ during the specified promotion period. The promotion will run from 2025-11-13 10:00 (UTC) to 2026-02-11 23:59 (UTC), and existing XTZ locked positions will also be eligible for the enhanced rewards. The subscription process will operate on a first-come, first-served basis, with specific minimum and maximum subscription limits impacting the APR

title: Taiwan Launches Bitcoin Reserve Study
description: Taiwan s Central Bank starts a formal review to add Bitcoin to national reserves.
content: Taiwan Launches Bitcoin Reserve StudyTaiwan s Central Bank starts a formal review to add Bitcoin to national reserves.

title: BitFuFu's Revenue Surges Amid Rising Bitcoin Demand
description: According to Cointelegraph, Singapore-based cloud Bitcoin miner BitFuFu reported a significant increase in its third-quarter revenue, doubling its earnings from the previous year. The surge was primarily driven by heightened demand for cloud mining and mining equipment, as miners sought to benefit from the rising price of Bitcoin. BitFuFu's total revenue reached $180. 7 million, with cloud mining contributing $122 million, as detailed in the company's Q3 earnings report released on Wednesday
content: BitFuFu's Revenue Surges Amid Rising Bitcoin DemandAccording to Cointelegraph, Singapore-based cloud Bitcoin miner BitFuFu reported a significant increase in its third-quarter revenue, doubling its earnings from the previous year. The surge was primarily driven by heightened demand for cloud mining and mining equipment, as miners sought to benefit from the rising price of Bitcoin. BitFuFu's total revenue reached $180. 7 million, with cloud mining contributing $122 million, as detailed in the company's Q3 earnings report released on Wednesday

title: Ethereum ETFs Experience Significant Outflows
description: According to BlockBeats, recent monitoring by Farside indicates that U. S. spot Ethereum ETFs saw a net outflow of $183. 7 million yesterday, marking the second consecutive day of outflows. Specifically, ETHA experienced a net outflow of $91 million, ETHE saw $49. 3 million withdrawn, Grayscale ETH had $23. 8 million in outflows, and FETH recorded a $19. 6 million outflow.
content: Ethereum ETFs Experience Significant OutflowsAccording to BlockBeats, recent monitoring by Farside indicates that U. Specifically, ETHA experienced a net outflow of $91 million, ETHE saw $49. 3 million withdrawn, Grayscale ETH had $23. 8 million in outflows, and FETH recorded a $19. 6 million outflow.

title: World Liberty Financial Collaborates with AB Blockchain for USD1 Deployment
description: According to Odaily, World Liberty Financial (WLFI) has partnered with AB Blockchain to successfully deploy USD1 on the AB network. This collaboration aims to enhance the user experience by leveraging AB Blockchain's high-performance capabilities, offering faster and more convenient stablecoin transactions. The AB decentralized wallet, AB Wallet, facilitates the use of USD1 with features such as zero transaction fees and instant transfers. It is fully compatible with all chains where USD1 is available
content: World Liberty Financial Collaborates with AB Blockchain for USD1 DeploymentAccording to Odaily, World Liberty Financial (WLFI) has partnered with AB Blockchain to successfully deploy USD1 on the AB network. This collaboration aims to enhance the user experience by leveraging AB Blockchain's high-performance capabilities, offering faster and more convenient stablecoin transactions. The AB decentralized wallet, AB Wallet, facilitates the use of USD1 with features such as zero transaction fees and instant transfers. It is fully compatible with all chains where USD1 is available

title: Metaplanet CEO Highlights Shareholder Support for Strategic Changes
description: According to BlockBeats, Simon Gerovich, CEO of the Japanese-listed Bitcoin treasury company Metaplanet, announced that the company has held five shareholder meetings over the past two years. During these meetings, shareholders approved all significant matters, including amending the company's articles of association to focus on Bitcoin treasury operations, increasing the number of authorized shares for Bitcoin acquisition, and issuing a new class of shares, specifically preferred stock. These processes were conducted under the leadership of the management team established before the company's transformation, following due procedures. At Metaplanet, corporate governance serves as the foundation for all decision-making
content: Metaplanet CEO Highlights Shareholder Support for Strategic ChangesAccording to BlockBeats, Simon Gerovich, CEO of the Japanese-listed Bitcoin treasury company Metaplanet, announced that the company has held five shareholder meetings over the past two years. During these meetings, shareholders approved all significant matters, including amending the company's articles of association to focus on Bitcoin treasury operations, increasing the number of authorized shares for Bitcoin acquisition, and issuing a new class of shares, specifically preferred stock. These processes were conducted under the leadership of the management team established before the company's transformation, following due procedures. At Metaplanet, corporate governance serves as the foundation for all decision-making

title: $30M Manipulation On Hyperliquid: The POPCAT Connection And What You Need To Know
description: Memecoin POPCAT experienced a significant downturn on Wednesday following a major manipulation event on Hyperliquid (HYPE), one of the leading decentralized exchanges in the cryptocurrency market. POPCAT Faces 43% Drop Following Manipulative Scheme According to a detailed analysis of the situation by DeFi researcher Hanzo on social media site X (previously Twitter), an unknown trader executed a well-coordinated strategy approximately 13 hours prior to the market disruption. The trader withdrew $3 million in USDC from the OKX exchange and distributed the funds across 19 different wallets on Hyperliquid. Subsequently, they initiated sizable long positions on POPCAT, accumulating total exposure estimated between $20 million and $30 million
content: $30M Manipulation On Hyperliquid: The POPCAT Connection And What You Need To KnowMemecoin POPCAT experienced a significant downturn on Wednesday following a major manipulation event on Hyperliquid (HYPE), one of the leading decentralized exchanges in the cryptocurrency market. POPCAT Faces 43% Drop Following Manipulative Scheme According to a detailed analysis of the situation by DeFi researcher Hanzo on social media site X (previously Twitter), an unknown trader executed a well-coordinated strategy approximately 13 hours prior to the market disruption. The trader withdrew $3 million in USDC from the OKX exchange and distributed the funds across 19 different wallets on Hyperliquid. Subsequently, they initiated sizable long positions on POPCAT, accumulating total exposure estimated between $20 million and $30 million

title: Chainlink’s Next Major Move Comes After This Range, Analyst Says
description: An analyst has pointed out how Chainlink could see its next major move after it breaks past the range of this technical analysis (TA) pattern. Chainlink Has Been Trading Inside A Triangle Recently In a new post on X, analyst Ali Martinez has shared about a pattern forming in the 1-week price of Chainlink. The pattern is a Triangle from TA, which is a type of consolidation channel that appears whenever an asset’s price trades between two converging trendlines. Related Reading: Bitcoin “Arguably Undervalued,” Says Analytics Firm: Here’s Why Like other consolidation patterns in TA, the upper level of a Triangle is a source of resistance, while the lower one that of support
